long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to show the overtime in Harvest.

How to setup:
- Download the extension.
- Click on the extension and authorize harvest.
- Click on the extension and fill out work hours and date.
- Select the tasks where you log your time off hours.
- Refresh the Harvest page.

Note: 
You need to fill out every workdays, such as public holidays manually for the extension to count the hours correctly.


Support:
